title: KRT 1
description: A new test for Python Developer.

questions.question: Which architectural choice best explains why mobile apps prefer JSON APIs over HTML responses?
options: To simplify UI rendering by offloading it to the backend
To reduce network load and allow client-side control
Because HTML parsing is not supported in mobile environments
Because API responses are automatically encrypted in mobile apps
questions.correctAnswer: To reduce network load and allow client-side control

questions.question: Which tool allows interception of HTTPS traffic from mobile apps by acting as a proxy with certificate installation?
Which scenario most likely indicates the use of session tokens in API communication?
options: Every request contains a unique URL parameter
The same Authorization header appears across multiple requests
Each request sends a new device fingerprint
API calls only succeed when cookies are present
questions.correctAnswer: The same Authorization header appears across multiple requests

questions.question: You're replaying a captured API request, but the server returns 401 Unauthorized despite identical headers. Whatâ€™s the most probable reason?
options: The endpoint accepts only GET requests
The session token has expired or is single-use
The request must include a browser User-Agent
questions.correctAnswer: The session token has expired or is single-use
